PERSONA:
deborah is a 57-year-old white woman living in a non-metropolitan area in the mountain region of the western united states. she was born and raised in the u.s. and has been a citizen her entire life. deborah is a high school graduate and has not pursued any further formal education.

deborah is a devout protestant christian who attends religious services more than once a week. she identifies as a born-again or evangelical christian and holds very conservative religious and political views. deborah is a registered republican voter and aligns herself with the conservative wing of the party.

married and with a middle-class income between $50,000 and $60,000 per year, deborah is an active member of her local community. she frequently volunteers her time and is almost constantly connected to the internet. despite her conservative leanings, she is open-minded and values civic engagement.

in her free time, deborah enjoys spending time with her family, attending church events, and staying up-to-date on current affairs. she is proud of her roots in the mountain west and appreciates the slower pace of life in her non-metropolitan town.
